snippet.title: Arcade Longplay [981] TwinBee (JP)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: KAGE-008

TwinBee is a vertically scrolling shooter released by Konami as an arcade video game in 1985 in Japan. Along with Sega's Fantasy Zone, released a year later, TwinBee is credited as an early archetype of the "cute 'em up" type in its genre.

This is the very first game in the series. You fight against five bosses and the level pattern repeats itself after completing level 6. This version is much nicer than the home ports IMO.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
